divs: Sighting DetailsSept 23rd 2013 7:50pm I noticed a bright white light hovering over Scarborough near Eglinton ave and Markham rd . The object sat there for about an hour and a half then desends and slowly moves south at no more then 20 klm. At first I thought satellite but then I noticed a cloud pass behind it and last time I checked planes didn't hover. Sept 24th 2013 at 8pm I noticed the light again repeating the same pattern as the night before. If your in the area look south west and who knows you might see it. Attached are 2 digital photos I took from sept 24th 2013. The first photo shows the starlike object hovering and the 2nd photo shows the object leaving in a west direction towards the DVP.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around September 23rd 2013
